videoData.title: Why we need a more accessible digital landscape
videoData.socialTitle: Why we need a more accessible digital landscape
videoData.description: Access to the internet is practically a prerequisite for getting ahead in the 21st century but millions worldwide have disabilities that prevent them from fully using it. Judy Brewer makes the compelling case for a concerted push towards a more accessible digital future.
videoData.socialDescription: Access to the internet is practically a prerequisite for getting ahead in the 21st century but millions worldwide have disabilities that prevent them from fully using it. Judy Brewer makes the compelling case for a concerted push towards a more accessible digital future.
